Bookmark: A CD Assistant can be used as a bookmark to hold a place in a book.
Door Stopper: A CD Assistant can be used as a door stopper to prevent a door from swinging shut.
Plant Pot: A CD Assistant can be used as a plant pot to hold small plants or flowers.
Pencil Holder: A CD Assistant can be used as a pencil holder to keep writing instruments organized.
Candle Holder: A CD Assistant can be used as a candle holder to hold a candle and provide a source of light.
